main.name: Kuei-Chin Huang
main.description: Full Stack React Developer who is enthusiastic with new techonolgies
main.bio: My name is Kuei-Chin (Doris), I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

education.degree: Master in Social and Regional Development

work.title: DevOps Analyst
work.description: Automated the process of generating a Portfolio Pipeline Report by coding M language in Power BI and imported data from JIRA APIs and SharePoint web link. These techniques improved work efficiency with a 70% reduction in time required to generate reports across multiple teams.

work.title: Data Loss Prevention Analyst
work.description: Demonstrated exceptional programming skills by developing Macro and VBA scripts that reduced the time required to generate Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Service Level Agreement (SLA) metrics reports by 70%.

projects.title: MERN Climbing Route Review
projects.category: An review app built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: Rock Climbing Gym Online Store
projects.category: E-Commerce website built with ASP.NET CORE

testimonials.text: Doris (Kuei-Chin) is one of the most hardworking students I have encountered during my studies at Georgian College. I can see her study and discuss with peers and teachers all the time. I think that's why she can get a very high academic record in the first year. She is also a good teammate for studying group. She is willing to share her knowledge with others and helping others. It is my honor to study with her.
